C++/CLI Sample
Demonstrates how to create a C++/CLI library using the VideoXpert SDK

20  NewSituation() {
21  _newSituation = new VxSdk::VxNewSituation();
22  _newSituation->Default();
23  }
24 
29  NewSituation(VxSdk::VxNewSituation* vxNewSituation) {
30  _newSituation = vxNewSituation;
31  }

39  property System::String^ Type {
40  public:
41  System::String^ get() { return gcnew System::String(_newSituation->type); }
42  void set(System::String^ value) { VxSdk::Utilities::StrCopySafe(_newSituation->type, Utils::ConvertSysString(value)); }
43  }
44

55  }

65  }

157 
162  property System::Collections::Generic::List<int>^ SnoozeIntervals {
163  public:
164  System::Collections::Generic::List<int>^ get() {
165  System::Collections::Generic::List<int>^ mlist = gcnew System::Collections::Generic::List<int>();
166 
167  for (int i = 0; i < _newSituation->snoozeIntervalSize; i++)
168  mlist->Add(_newSituation->snoozeIntervals[i]);
169 
170  return mlist;
171  }
172  void set(System::Collections::Generic::List<int>^ value) {
173  _newSituation->snoozeIntervalSize = value->Count;
174  int *intervals = new int[_newSituation->snoozeIntervalSize];
175 
176  for (int i = 0; i < _newSituation->snoozeIntervalSize; i++)
177  intervals[i] = value[i];
178 
179  _newSituation->snoozeIntervals = intervals;
180  }
181  }
182 
183  internal:
184  VxSdk::VxNewSituation* _newSituation;
185  };
186 }
